items.title: We have a fossil closer to our split with Neanderthals and Denisovans
bullets: • A group of 773,000-year-old hominin fossils from Morocco may shed new light on when our species branched off from the ancestors of Neanderthals and Denisovans
• Archaeologists unearthed the bones just southwest of Casablanca in a cave aptly named Grotte à Hominidés
• They’re just fragments of what used to be hominins: an adult’s lower jawbone, plus the partial lower jaw from another adult and a very young child

items.title: 0% intro APR until 2024 is 100% insane
bullets: • The Wells Fargo Reflect® Card is designed for people who want some breathing room from interest
• It offers an incredible 0% intro APR for 21 months from account opening on purchases and qualifying balance transfers
• The card doesn't pile on extras like rewards, but if your goal is to stop interest in its tracks, it's a slam dunk

items.title: Weekend projections: Avatar delivers firepower on blockbuster weekend for new releases
bullets: • Avatar: Fire and Ash is debuting well behind Avatar: The Way of Water, which scooped up $134 million on its opening weekend back in 2022
• It is lower than our pre-release prediction of $97 million, and also our Friday-morning $95-million prediction
• A good day on Sunday could see it hit $90 million still
